name: Marley Eternit
description:
Marley Eternit is part of the worldwide Etex Company and is the leading provider of roofing and cladding solutions to the construction industry.
     
Our unrivalled product portfolio includes architectural fibre cement facades, all types of concrete and clay tiles, double and single lap slates and profiled sheeting.

product_images.title: Cedral Weatherboard
product_images.description: With the visual appeal of natural timber, simplicity of installation and resistance to rot, Cedral Weatherboard is an attractive, low maintenance alternative to PVCu.

product_images.title: Textura Fibre Cement Facade
product_images.description: Textura fibre cement panels have a highly glazed and textured finish. A wide range of colours, including factory approved RAL colours are available ensuring the right colour for your project.

product_images.title: Pictura Fibre Cement Facade
product_images.description: Pictura is coated with an additional surface treatment, providing a hard, smooth, silky matt surface.  Available in a variety of shades allowing flexibility of design.

product_images.title: Eter-Color Fibre Cement Facade
product_images.description: Eter-Color's through coloured material offers elegant shades of natural colour.  Each panel is characterised by fine sanded lines and naturally occurring hues which provide a unique aesthetic effect.

product_images.title: Natura Fibre Cement Facade
product_images.description: Natura's through coloured material allows the texture of the fibres to show through, offering a unique visual appearance. This combined with an extensive colour choice, provides a high degree of flexibility and an aesthetically appealing finish.
